title: An aqueous Zn-polyoxometalate battery for decoupled hydrogen production from alkaline water electrolysis
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00331D, Paper
Xin-Qing Wang, Meng-Jiao Liu, Xiao-Yuan Wu, Sa-Sa Wang, Weiming Wu, Can-Zhong Lu
An aqueous Zn-polyoxometalate battery was designed for decoupled H2 production from water electrolysis with highly dispersed ultrafine Pt nanoparticles on nickelâ€“cobalt hydroxide nanosheets at a low Pt loading as a free-standing HER electrode.
